name: Time Crunch (Corrin, PixiePal)
description:
Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/q6VBMQmG2m4gCYxSA

Your vehicle auto-accelerates.

A/D: Turn

S: Brake (Also makes you turn faster)

Left/Right arrow key: Strafe

Space: Boost (Note: Boosting will accrue heat, but we didn't have time to implement a display. Boosting too much will kill you.)
